TopicTitle: [1.1.3] (2016-07-24) Telemachus - Telemetry and Flight Control in the Web Browser

Articles.Content:
Ok. Got the 1.5 version compiling now! Here's what I've implemented so far:

For Vessel:

v.canComm -- current CommNet ability to communicate

v.canScience -- current CommNet ability to transmit Science

v.isConnected  -- Is connected to CommNet

v.isConnectedHome -- Is connected to KDSN (Kerbin Deep Space Network)

v.getCrew -- List of current crew members names

 

More to come!

Edited December 20, 2016 by JOHNMKNIGHT
Accidently Saved before I was done.
Hi, can someone point me to the tutorial on how to to use telemachus on an android device? Thanks.

On 09/12/2016 at 11:37 AM, rocketstrong said:

the web socket does not appear to be working anymore in the latest version. it connects then instantly disconnects

I experience the same problem with the websocket.

It connects fine and disconnects as soon as a message is sent.

On 12/22/2016 at 7:41 AM, GagaX said:

Hi, can someone point me to the tutorial on how to to use telemachus on an android device? Thanks.

Nothing different. Just make sure you're on the same network. Use a browser like Chrome or the default one.

@tcannonfodder I've been working with the 1.5.1 and 1.6 codebases for a while. I discovered that the API's for handling the sensor data is broken. I've been trying to debug but no solution yet. (ie. datalink?a=s.sensor.temp) always returns  

{"a":[["No Sensors of the Appropriate Type"],[0]]}
I'm sorry, I'm a bit new to the mod. I was wondering if there is a way for me to get output a data table of some sort with values taken every .5 seconds of various information.
Any idea on when this mod is getting an update ?

2 minutes ago, Exorion said:

Any idea on when this mod is getting an update ?

If you'll check the last page, it is being worked on for some time, and there is a working download for 1.2.2 already.

On 23/01/2017 at 7:35 PM, monstah said:

If you'll check the last page, it is being worked on for some time, and there is a working download for 1.2.2 already.

Indeed thanks, I was only checking the Github and the topic title.
Some mods go through long rough periods after game updates, unfortunately

On 12/20/2016 at 1:57 PM, JOHNMKNIGHT said:

Ok. Got the 1.5 version compiling now! Here's what I've implemented so far:

For Vessel:

v.canComm -- current CommNet ability to communicate

v.canScience -- current CommNet ability to transmit Science

v.isConnected  -- Is connected to CommNet

v.isConnectedHome -- Is connected to KDSN (Kerbin Deep Space Network)

v.getCrew -- List of current crew members names

 

More to come!

Do you know when we'll get a release of the above?  If it is going to be a while, could I get a development build of this?

I want to use Telemachus to help determine how certain orbital profiles affect communication and I think the above is what I need.

TIA

Question, I have Houston installed and Telemachus up and running correctly. I can't pull up Houston in the web browser. I copy and pasted the above link and verified IP/port were correct, but still nothing. Any help would be appreciated. I'm not tech savvy. Let me know what you need if you need anything to help me. Thanks in advance.

Edit: I figured it out. I installed Houston incorrectly in the folder.

Edited February 3, 2017 by nightstalker101s

Hey everyone!

Thanks so much for all your patience and support, it means a lot to me. It's been a pretty rough few months, so I haven't had time to dig into the code base rewrite. @JOHNMKNIGHT, I'm excited to see your new endpoints! Do you have a link to your repo on the repository? I may be able to use it as a jumping-off point for the new version.

I'm hoping to tackle the rewrite soon. Thanks again to everyone for understanding. Telemachus and Houston are projects I have a ton of fun working on, I just haven't had much time for them lately.

thanks for continuing to maintain this!

is there any way to change the update frequency for the web ui?  it's a bit slow

On 05/12/2016 at 0:37 AM, tcannonfodder said:

Good news everyone! I just got Telemachus compiled to support 1.2+! It should work, but let me know if you run into any issues!

 

Telemachus 1.5.1 (Calipso, the current stable build)

 

Telemachus 1.6.0 Alpha 3 (The latest development build, with Camera Feed Support)

How does the Camera Feed work? I can't find any option to use it, and does it work with Hullcam cameras?

Hey there. Long story, thought I'd lost the code, then had troubles with Github. Here's a like to the code changes in My Dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/6svbo47fjeat18c/AAAmlMIncylKJdFkBzZAHkt3a?dl=0

Not sure what the problem is (kinda new to using network functionality for KSP) but when I right click on the antenna and click "open link" the browser says it can't load the page.  Im running on a Mac and I am fully up to date on KSP and telemachus.  Any help would be appricated.

New version is awesome, going to put these two old iPad 2s I have to use with it.  May attempt to build some kind of console to fit in with my X55.  What would be really awesome is a way to use the in-game IVA MFD displays via Telemachus.  Barring that, anyone have a walkthrough on how to build a new page for Telemachus?
Is there a way to change the Kerbin map to an Earth map?

2 minutes ago, Uace24 said:

Is there a way to change the Kerbin map to an Earth map? 

I would also like to know this, been playing with GPP lately.

Heya!

I got some new versions compiled for 1.5 (the latest stable release), and 1.6 (the camera endpoint)

Links below!

  • 1.5: Dragon
  • 1.6.0 Alpha 4

Let me know if anything's broken and if you have any other questions!

Sweet!!... now when I get my computer sorted so i can play KSP again, this will be one of the first mods I try...

Also, I just submitted a PR containing the files for that "atmospheric" antenna I made for Telemachus...
